Edwards'], 'Starring': ['Mike Vogel', 'Rachelle Lefevre', 'Alexander Koch'], 'Studio': ['CBS']}
Review Text: Lame.  I sort of liked season 1.  Watching season 2 was painful.  By the time I finished watching season 2 I was hoping the dome would crush me and put me out of my misery.  It is my own fault.  I watched it of my own free will.  I take full responsibility.
Review Title: Lame. I sort of liked season 1
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Content Preference:** Enjoys engaging and entertaining shows, particularly in the reality or documentary genre, but has a discernible threshold for quality. 
- **Language:** Prefers content in English, maintaining a focus on mainstream media.
- **Viewing Experience:** Values a streamlined and cohesive viewing experience; has a low tolerance for excessive editing or repetition, which detracts from enjoyment.
- **Critical Assessments:** Provides balanced reviews, appreciating entertaining aspects while not hesitating to call out negative features that significantly impact the viewing experience. Recently demonstrated a pattern of harsh criticism when expectations are not met, particularly when subsequent seasons fail to uphold the quality of earlier ones.
- **Engagement Style:** Engages through rating and written feedback, showcasing a reflective approach to evaluating content. The user recently applied a low rating to a show after expressing frustration with a disappointing season, indicating a willingness to hold shows accountable for their quality.

Overall, while the user seeks genuine entertainment, they are increasingly skeptical and critical of content that does not maintain high standards, showing a clear preference for shows that deliver consistency and quality across all seasons.
